# Obscure Object (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (chameleon skin)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One object touched of up to 100 lbs./level

**Duration:** 8 hours (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (object)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (object)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 317

This spell hides an object from location by divination (scrying) effects, such as the *scrying* spell or a *[[Crystal Ball|crystal ball]]*. Such an attempt automatically fails (if the divination is targeted on the object) or fails to perceive the object (if the divination is targeted on a nearby location, object, or person).
